name: Tropical Depression Tendency (Part 1)
description:
🌺 TROPICAL DEPRESSION TENDENCY (PART 1) 🌺

you find yourself trapped in a beautiful tropical resort with no memory of how you got there. make your way through a seemingly-flawless paradise while processing deep trauma and overcoming spiraling depressive states.

🌺 tropical depression tendency is free to play! i'm making this small game on my own time to work through a lot of things and i would love for anyone else to enjoy it without a price attached. if you want to donate to the project, please feel free -- all donations are appreciated!

🌺 you can also support my game work via ko-fi! ko-fi.com/deltahead

🌺 please read the following content warnings!: body horror, sharp objects, self-harm, suicide, abuse mention, body-shaming mention, gender dysphoria, transphobia mention, blood, loud sounds, overall mildly disturbing/bummer material

🌺 feel free to leave comments + questions in the board below! also feel free to email d.d.deltahead@gmail.com if you need help, and check out the dev blog tropical-depression-tendency.tumblr.com.

🌺 part 2 coming... soon! (december 2018???)
